## NgxPrimerAccordionRootComponentToken variable

Injection token for the root component of the NgxPrimerAccordion.

This token is used to inject the root component of the accordion, which is of type `NgxPrimerAccordionRootComponent<unknown>`<!-- -->.

  {<!-- -->InjectionToken<!-- -->&lt;<!-- -->NgxPrimerAccordionRootComponent<unknown>&gt;<!-- -->}

**Signature:**

```typescript
NgxPrimerAccordionRootComponentToken: InjectionToken<NgxPrimerAccordionRootComponent<unknown>>
```
